experiences.description: Developed and maintained core modules for a large-scale enterprise software platform. Focused on improving performance and scalability. Used Java and SQL.

Analyzed market trends and customer data to identify new product opportunities. Created detailed business requirements documents for new features and enhancements. Worked closely with engineering and marketing teams.

Drove the product roadmap for AI-powered marketing automation software, prioritizing features based on market research and user feedback. Collaborated with engineering and design to ensure timely and high-quality product delivery. Analyzed product performance and identified opportunities for growth and optimization. Managed a team of three associate product managers.

education.description: Majored in Computer Science. GPA: 3.8/4.0. Participated in the Robotics Club and the Programming Competition.
Focused on entrepreneurship and marketing. GPA: 3.9/4.0. Member of the Entrepreneurship Club and the Marketing Club.
